frontmatter.title: Flex
frontmatter.summary: The Flexbox Layout module aims at providing a more efficient way to lay out, align and distribute space among items in a container, even when their size is unknown and/or dynamic.

frontmatter.title: Transmission Control Protocol
frontmatter.summary: The transmission control protocol (TCP) is the internet standard ensuring the successful exchange of data packets between devices over a network.

frontmatter.title: Hypertext Transfer Protocol
frontmatter.summary: The Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) is an application protocol for distributed, collaborative, hypermedia information systems

frontmatter.summary: The Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) is an application protocol for distributed, collaborative, hypermedia information systems

frontmatter.summary: Trash talk: the Orinoco garbage collector

frontmatter.title: Gulp
frontmatter.summary: Gulp is a stram-based build system, designed for big project, small, idiomatic node modules.

frontmatter.title: Vim
frontmatter.summary: vim is a screen-oriented text editor originally created for the Unix operating system
